nodes.text: Kray'geen T'ihar was a male Mon Calamari who served the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. Assigned to the planet Bundim, T'ihar took over the Alliance network several years before the Battle of Yavin during a time of crisis and built up the Alliance's military and economic resources. Following the Imperial occupation of the planet and the Battle of Heg, T'ihar took command of the Alliance remnants, vowing to learn from their previous mistakes.
